name: Mypythoncodebase
body:
# MyPythonCodeBase

**Here is my Python codebase,something simple as the freshman in Python**.

Mainly after learning python, I am touched by so cool code.Powerful lib support me to do everything I want(may be :-)).

And I want to share my happiness while no one can see me. Other people seem don't want to learn such a cool programming language.

What a terrible. But If you see this, you must the guy love python like me. We can talk about those questions we meet for better.

I am here waiting for you , all the time!

---

If you have some good ideas and thinkings , you can email to me. 

Let's enjoy the fly.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
